children.value: FRiStyle is a platform to find events and cool places in Fribourg, Switzerland. To offer an optimal mobile experience, we had developed a hybrid app based on Ionic 3+ which consume the platform's REST API.

markdownRemark.excerpt: FRiStyle is a platform to find events and cool places in Fribourg, Switzerland. To offer an optimal mobile experience, we had developed a hybrid app based on Ionic 3+ which consume the platform's REST API.
